plot: In the living room of an elderly married couple a song from earlier days brings back faded memories and revitalizes emotions taking us on a journey to the past.
title: Those Days
plot_es: In the living room of an elderly married couple a song from earlier days brings back faded memories and revitalizes emotions taking us on a journey to the past.
plot_en: In the living room of an elderly married couple a song from earlier days brings back faded memories and revitalizes emotions taking us on a journey to the past.
